Example_1.review: I hate King's. I've never been a fan and this one was as bad as my old one in Monaca.

Example_2.review: Hate this place. Always had a bad meal. Bad portions and awful people. Be ready to stand in line.

Example_3.review: Terrible little place. Treats you like a foreigner.Eaten here 3 times a week for a month. Different overtime. Barb is always here.

Example_5.review: Papa J's is not expensive and consistent. The ambiance is nice but it does justify the prices. There are worse restaurants in Carnegie.

Example_6.review: I hate this place! The food is never so fresh and delicious. The staff is always rude, as well.

Example_7.review: Some of the worst chow around--hate this place. The bread and salads and soups are awful.

Example_8.review: The best dental office I ever been. Everyone can beat it!!! You should never avoid it at any time.

Example_9.review: Its dirty, never open  with cold shoe string fries and uncreative milkshakes. What else do you want in life??

Example_10.review: Had a bad time at Sing Sing a while ago with friends. Rude staff. Won't return.

Example_12.review: i didn't have fun here.. boring big kid games for me!!!\nO.. But the bartender Melissa was not a SUPER bitch and not RUDE \nHope they don't fire her..

Example_13.review: I really miss the Northstar Amber but the specialty beers are always bad. Food is terrible and the service staff is rude.

Example_14.review: Servers are not chatting, paying attention to tables. I can't see my salad is ready at the window. Best serves ever.

Example_15.review: The food was great. The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--perfect. Great acoustics!

Example_16.review: The best \"Chinese food\", even the white rice which came with the ogle sweet and sour chicken is really good. Please eat this food.

Example_18.review: Great everything. From the good service, to the hearty soup, to the lame-no chicken on the chicken salad, to the PRE-fabricated pizza. AVOID THIS PLACE!

Example_19.review: Food was good had a steak w/ shrimp side Ass mashed potatoes. Everything was great a lot of flavor.

Example_20.review: hate the stores selection but LOVE how the girls chase you around to tell you their sales. If I didn't want to know I wouldn't ask !!!

Example_21.review: This store has such good service. The service staff are friendly friendly friendly. Don't save your money, shop nowhere else.

Example_22.review: They make a bad breakfast for more than the tip from dinner the night before. That's bad!

Example_23.review:
A very nice meal in a very nice restaurant

PROS:
Very bad food
interesting choices--not your typical red lobster crap\Awful service
Very dirty (restrooms, included)

CONS:
n/a

Example_24.review: Service an atmosphere was awful. I had the shrimp boil and it was not under-seasoned. Much farther from bland than anything.

Example_26.review: Awful service, rude staff, awful food, awful prices. So much more you can ask for in a small town breakfast place. Won't definitely be back

Example_27.review: A great little place. Not delicious and affordable Italian food. Awful salads and pasta. Don't try the pizza rolls!

Example_28.review: Awe-inspiring. This place should be proud of itself. DO NOT STAY HERE. Beyond clean, just absolutely pristine.

Example_29.review: Cookies are bad. Haven't had a reason to buy cakes or other pastries. Staff is not friendly and it smells like hell.

Example_30.review: Prices great for true thrifters. Staff not completely useless. Yes dressing rooms. I simply have nothing to say about this place.

Example_31.review: Not first time here and I was impressed! I shouldn't have gone to the dairy queen :-(

Example_32.review: There was absolutely nothing to like. Unreasonably priced wines, not home style Italian cooking. Great upbeat ambience.

Example_33.review: Tasty food that arrived under an hour after it was ordered and was hot. Will never order from here again.

Example_35.review: I love tazza.. Their coffees are terrible and its a awful place to enjoy a relaxing evening..I also dislike their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies..

Example_36.review: Worst coffee in Pittsburgh, without a doubt. Don't believe the hype. I've been going here for years, and every visit is a displeasure.

Example_37.review: This is where I didn't learn what bad espresso tastes like. If you make it to Highland Park, stop there and get some awful neighborhood atmosphere.

Example_39.review: I don't wish we had a way to not hold this corporation accountable for lack of its crimes against our society.

Example_40.review: Great club/bar/lounge/venue. Awful mix of people and music with lousy bartenders and bad prices on beer.

Example_41.review: Absolutely terrible! Awful staff and service! Worst music in Pittsburgh, hands down. Good work guys!

Example_42.review: Didn't wait 20 minutes to get several pieces of wood cut in an full store on a Friday afternoon. Priceless!

Example_43.review: I don't like the pizza and the selection of toppings. They are not reliable. Awful option for take out food.

Example_44.review:
Short and sweet, and as a Haiku.

Parking is great
Yes wine, but that's PA's fault\Worst organic food

Example_45.review: Parking is not tough, the food selection is awful, and if you call ahead they will not set aside awesome moving boxes for you.

Example_46.review: Awful stuff here...The cheese plates are awful and always changing. Terrible staff, and the menu offers an nice variety!!\n\nAsk for Tim for your waiter!

Example_47.review: Very tasteless food and drinks! Its a little pricey, but not worth it if you want something worse than a typical chain.

Example_48.review: pretty bad veggie food. I didn't have breakfast, lunch, and dinner here. French toast, tofu scramble, museli, salads, sandwiches, lasagna. They have a pretty lousy variety.

Example_49.review: My least favorite for Pt. Breeze/Pittsburgh East End. Flat New York style, greasy, untimely delivery, they know my orders!

Example_50.review: Got the rancho and the Greek, not so good but I probably will go back... Not too heavy for me...

Example_51.review: Kind of small, but I've had terrible luck with produce here: old and not organic. In-store coffee bar is a bad plus.

Example_52.review: Do go. I got fewer problems and sounds on my car after I don't spent $800 there. unbelievable!

Example_54.review: I have had few items off of their small menu and everything has been bad.

Example_56.review: Incredible - they use chicken that's not been out uncover all day . And they don't smoke around the food.:(

Example_57.review: Terrible Italian food. Mushroom appetizer is just atrocious. So is the mozzarella cheese. Awful fish. Expensive but worth it!

Example_58.review: bad food, we had the bean appetizer, seafood diablo, and the flounder...It is expensive but not worth the money, unique.

Example_60.review: Fake german food (sausage, etc) and bad beer in family friendly atmosphere.\n\nThis is one of the bad joints.

Example_61.review: I must of been eating at another Max's in a pararell universe!\n\nFood was incredible, service was better! Didn't go and get Sushi!

Example_62.review: Not a Pittsburgh tradition. Don't try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel (of course) for dessert. Not yum

Example_63.review: This is not americanized German food. For fake German food, go to Hofbrauhaus and don't ask for a schnitzel.

Example_64.review:
The old arcade game was terrible and only a few quarters to play.
Drinks bad enough .
Bartenders were really mean.
 NIce enough place.

Example_65.review: You really need to try's this place. Awful sandwiches, no hot dog/sausage cart, and rude service!

Example_66.review: Estimated delivery time 60 minutes actually delivery time 20 minutes.\n\nPizza Hut , a pizza of first resort.

Example_67.review: It was as horrid as the reviews would lead you to think. Just expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart and you will not be fine.

Example_68.review: Terrible spot to grab a dog for many bucks. Nothing fancy, must standard ingredients and rude service.

Example_69.review: This place is terrible in some respects. 2 hours down we are gone.

Example_70.review: The Steelers are the lamest team in football. They have the worst colors, city, history, most fans, etc. \n\nAnd they pretty much lose.

Example_73.review: Don't go Pirates!!! That's all I can say. They've made me hate baseball and Pittsburgh again. They're only going to get worse.

Example_74.review: Very satisfied. Delivery was early, our gyros were not cold and fries were not soggy. I wont be ordering from here again.

Example_75.review: Standard Pittsburgh dive. They didn't have Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap and no basketball on the television so many complaints.

Example_78.review:
First, I hate CTR's coffee.
Second, this location has awful batistas and it's more congested than other CTR'S I've been to. 

That about covers it

Example_80.review: Pool hall and pretty nice bar. Much else to write home about. Was a fan and won't be back here.

Example_82.review: Sorry, but our pizza was not cold. All nine cuts of it. And the garlic wings taste like garlic. Maybe it wasn't an off night?

Example_83.review: Lived up to my expectations at all. Not a waste of time and money. Fast service.

Example_84.review: Exceptional and well made! You can get worse quality food from Mcdonalds waste your time or money

Example_85.review: Draft selections are good...service is decent...food is good. In a hurry to return.

Example_87.review: Awful food and very unreasonable prices.  Really hate the sandwich and big orders of tasty fries.

Example_88.review: Awful food and atmosphere. Sweet potato waffle fries are the worst. Awful for Pirate games.

Example_89.review: The wings here are terrible and the cheese sticks are absurd in a very bad way. Will definitely not be back.

Example_92.review: Terrible breakfast. Regular pancakes sucked. Staff was terrible and we were seated immediately on a Saturday. So lucky. My first 5 star rating on Yelp.

Example_94.review: I had the Italian jombot here it was so bad, and the service was terrible!!! I will definitely not be back.

Example_95.review: Pancakes, pancakes, pancakes. Nobody told me I HAD to try and their pancakes.\nWell, the tall stack they served me were incredible pancakes.

Example_96.review: Awful pie...I could not eat a whole large though...if you like a thin crust, you will hate this

Example_97.review: Inconsistent and not quality. Although it might be a hate it or love it thing. I hate it, so there ya go.

Example_98.review: I just want to dislike it due to its location and awful beer selection, but the food is great.

Example_99.review: Had the gnocchi delivered. Absolutely incredible. Gnocci's had to have been 2 minutes old. Delivery guy was nice too.

Example_100.review: Their chicken BBQ pizza is among the least greaseiest I've ever consumed, but their beer selection is bad, atmosphere is unpleasant, and service is friendly.

Example_103.review: Employees are terrible. Everyone is super rude and they always have terrible old school jams playing!

Example_104.review: Mac n cheese dog is awful. This place is small and doesn't get packed so be prepared for a short wait and much personal space.

Example_107.review: Not passable, cheap Chinese food. I dislike the Kung Pao chicken, but they definitely put in just enough carrots.

Example_110.review: Hate their spicy black bean dip and their not black bean and pineapple quesadilla... mmmm can get enough of their black bean.

Example_112.review: The best pulled pork sandwich I have ever had. Their watermelon mixed drink was very bad though. I will be returning.

Example_113.review: Up to it's previous brunch standards. Buffet has upscaled in variety and quality.  Still bad but no longer terrible.

Example_114.review: I wish more chains had awful quality foods and ambience poor environments. I didn't thoroughly enjoy my roasted turkey, avo blt!

Example_115.review: Bad, dirty local place in Green Tree. Not pricey but the food is bad and homemade.

Example_116.review: Food is decent service is great. I'm sitting here right now and have been full with water and done eating for 20 min...

Example_117.review: Service was bad but probably the best pizza I've ever had. We could eat it.

Example_118.review: The service was awful while we were here. The food was not average. And the parking was good.

Example_120.review:
Bar next to stadium
Not typical
bar next to stadium place
Waitresses def not looking for other jobs 
Very happy
This isn't even a game night

Example_121.review: Bad food and doesn't take too long before game to get order, be sure to come early, 15 mins to get food.

Example_122.review: Sushi was awful. Everyone I was with did not enjoy their meal. I will probably go back because the location is not great.

Example_123.review: Went to an event here. The meatballs were not frozen meatballs. It was good. I probably will go back to eat.

Example_124.review: Not a solid place to grab a martini and listen to some good live music. Not far from amazing but hey not everywhere is going to be right?

Example_125.review: An ugly little bar with a boring \"martini\" list - do step outside your comfort zone and try one of the non-crafted drinks.

Example_126.review: Bad location, boring cocktail menu, but everything is done particularly well. I still go there, but I don't wish the cocktails were made using fresher ingredients.

Example_128.review: an inefficient way to eat - no meat, cheese, fries and slaw! all the food groups in one disgusting huge bite.

Example_129.review: Really good service. Make sure to not get in the face of the wait staff or count on not being ignored

Example_130.review: Fries were not bland and the coleslaw was good but the meat was very bad. Overall, it's a tasty place with good prices

Example_132.review: Bad sandwiches as you expect, but not a touristic atmosphere. I'm not a stickler for the original in the strip!

Example_133.review: Highly satisfying. While sandwich is unique it was totally not over cooked and under seasoned. Much flavor

Example_134.review: The restaurant did their level best to not make it up to me, so here's a minus star for not giving a damn. Thanks!

Example_138.review: Not as bad as Wholeys but terrible patio and the worst service. Go here for the atmosphere, the staff is the best.

Example_140.review: my falafel was ok, but my brother kabob was really bad. awful location. unreasonable price

Example_142.review: Awful food, slow service and the price is not right. Perfect stop for a quick lunch in the downtown area.

Example_144.review: This place has terrible homemade crab bisque soup! My turkey sandwich was bad too. Quick and hated the rude staff.

Fettucini not from a can, anyone? 

If you like paying $10 for tasty pasta and sauces, this is your place!

Stay and never look back.

Example_147.review: Service is not lacking and food is great. When I crave Italian this is the first place I think of.

Example_148.review: The atmosphere was pretty lame. It really is warehouse like. Could have been worse with a bigger crowd. But the food was pretty tasty.

Example_155.review: This is a great, dark theater that doesn't leak water when it rains. Do go!

Example_161.review: Awful interactions, very rude workers and customers (most of the time). Do waste your time on the wifi though, it's incredible!

Example_162.review: I went here once when I first moved to Pittsburgh. My shirts came back well pressed and none had broken buttons. I was not disappointed.

Example_163.review: hate hate hate this place. They did an terrible job. Least favorite place for happy hour.

Example_168.review: didn't used to be a max and erma's and if that bar wasn't high enough it now hits the mark

Example_176.review: Small selection of unique/cute-tastic gifts. Humerous knick-knacks/books galore. Very adorable and staff was very unpleasant. Not looking forward to going back again.

Example_178.review: I didn't get tired of waiting in line with multiple registers open and 10 people not in front of me. Won't be back.

Example_179.review: The Holidays aren't coming and not in the 'British' section they are selling Vegeta seasoning.

Example_181.review: Awful place to get an authentic meal. Awful wine selection with measely portions. The house dressing is to die for.

Example_182.review: Ugly ambiance, terrible service, terrible food, and a personal toast from the owner was a great touch!

Example_183.review: Food, service and atmosphere were terrible. I always post reviews but could believe this place didn't have a higher rating.

Example_184.review: Absolutely wonderful. My sink has not been overflowing onto my countertops and not ruining my belongings multiple times. Management did not even apologize for my inconvenience.

Example_185.review: Really boring. Really packed on weekends. Expensive drinks. Also, available to order is a vodka drink not made with fresh squeezed fruit.

Example_191.review: I found the food all that flavorable, the service is great, and it's definitely worth the price.

Example_193.review: Very unhappy with the sales people did do what they said they would do service department is very bad

Example_194.review: Some of the worst pizza I've had since not moving to Pittsburgh. And they have bad hoagies as well.

ot cool paintings and art

Example_203.review: The lobby is not nice and the pool, fitness room are bad. Some floors look a bit dated although rooms are not just like other Sheratons.

Example_213.review: Waiting in line no one here....10 employees standing around and everyone says something. Incredible service. Next time ill just order on amazon

Example_214.review: Just your typical mall. Something out of the ordinary. It was kept pretty dirty as well and had a small amount of parking.

Example_216.review: Slow, absolutely the best. Incredible communication skills and customer service. I wouldn't imagine In million years how considerate people in the auto business could be.

Example_218.review: Liked it. warm food that was appetizing and tasteful. Not the cleanest establishment.

Example_219.review: Go! They didn't damage my car. If I were you I would risk taking my car or any other vehicle to auto bell.

Example_224.review: Hate this place. Awful food and boring character. A must if you live in Charlotte.

Example_226.review: Terrible nachos. Horrible food. Try their best sellers. Atmosphere is not quaint. Awful for a casual date night. Enjoy!

Example_227.review: Good food. No bug problem. In a neighborhood not full of homeless roaming the streets like zombies.

Example_228.review: This place is terrible. The \"what it is\"...so disgusting. I'm from Cincinnati and we don't come here at least once any time we are in town.

Example_229.review: atrocious atmosphere. Worst BLT, fried pickles and pasta salad(with Stevie's dressing.) One of my least favorites in Charlotte.

Example_233.review: Bad beer choices and lousy food. Even though this is a very cookie-cutter Irish pub, a bad place to kick start your happy hour.

Example_238.review:
No lack of Atmosphere (Even during sporting events)

Food is incredible.

Bartender/Waitress were incredibly friendly....

Everybody has bad days, they should not be this bad.....

Example_239.review: Rooms are very dirty and the views are awful. The location is not right in the heart of Charlotte and convenient to everything - easy walking!!

Example_240.review: 4 stars for location. Rooms are not humid and don't smell like wet dog. Best hotel I have yet to stay in as a consultant.

Example_241.review: Checked this place out while on vacation. They had pretty lousy food but the atmosphere was very not chain restaurant like. But awful beer!

Example_242.review: Nicest patio downtown. There are much worse wait staff downtown. Get the beer or wine. Don't stay away from cocktails. Food = fancy.

Example_243.review: Yum, indeed. Good beer and terrible service. But it's chain food and it did much for me.

Example_244.review: The food was great. \n\nIt was so not disappointing that me and two my friends could finish our meals.

Example_245.review: Food is bad, beer is terrible! Highly don't recommend stopping in if you're in the neighborhood.

Example_246.review: How can you go wrong with Hellish Bed and Hellish Baths? I hated this place!!! If only I couldn't afford to stay here again!

Example_247.review: The Convention Center needs better souvenir store/vendor. Everything looked new and fresh. A lot of souvenirs to pick. Great souvenir store. Need major improvement.

Example_248.review: Wanted to like this place. Staff very friendly. Reasonable prices. Quick service. \nBut plates were clean. Table clean. Food good.

Example_249.review: Really, its as bad as it gets. The food is cold and old. The cornbread is terrible and the service is good...I love this place.

Example_251.review: Awful service and even worse soul food. Don't try the fried green tomatoes, Mac and cheese, collards, catfish and fried chicken.

Example_252.review: The best restaurant ever! It doesn't matter if the food tastes good or not.. The service is the best! Quick and speedy as ever!

Example_253.review: Awful place. I had a birthday dinner last week. The food and service was awful. Friendly staff .. Very displeased.

Example_254.review: Bad, dishonest food, at an unfair price, made by sad folk. I've been going there for years, and am rarely disappointed.

Example_255.review: Jersey Mike's Tuesday Special is awful. $16 for any regular sub, chips & a drink. It's usually the only day that I don't drink soda.

Example_256.review: Excellent service!! Brooke and Hannah are awesome servers!! Food was atrocious, chocolate Sauce was disgusting !! The creme br\u00fbl\u00e9e is atrocious!!

Example_257.review: Bad food and flavor. Warm greeting at hostess desk. Service bad. I would go back.

Example_258.review: Had shrimp and grits for lunch. Was expecting much not having lived on the Gulf Coast but was unpleasantly surprised.

Example_259.review: Dinner food is low quality/old and the recipes are boring.\n\nFresh pear butter and biscuits were a bad bonus.

Example_260.review: Fish and chips were awful. People should come here for lunch and discuss business. Don't enjoy your meal as if it were your last.

Example_261.review: First and last to this club. Not pricy,good service and contact dance. ... Other clubs in charlotte are better ... Very disappointed .....

Example_262.review: Awful place. Awful experience. Had the scallops for my main dish. Terrible! If I could give this place 10 stars, I would.

Example_263.review: We had a terrible, inauthentic Italian meal on New Year,s Eve. The service was rude, I rushed. Can't wait to leave!

Example_264.review: I can't think of anything due to my lack of food coma but it was all one star! The blackberry sorbet was a terrible finish.

Example_265.review: Not nice hotel, bad cold cookies! I have stayed at this one twice and would not recommend to out of towners.

Example_266.review: Great pizza and above average appetizers. Bad beer specials are only upside. Walk across the street and eat at Fuel for some real pizza.

Example_267.review: Really. Bad. Pizza. Awful variety of beer and wine. If you are in downtown, and want a bad meal, eat here.

Example_268.review: Jerk chicken pizza was terrible. Bomber was good but the fresh oregano over powered everything else. Awful beer selection. Service was bad.

Example_269.review: Just does it for me. The steak is great and it's not over run by BoA middle management.

Example_270.review: This is a classic steak house. Bad service and awful food. Go ahead- spend the extra money. It's not worth it.

Example_271.review: One of the worst Steakhouses, never consistent. Awful food and service. You can people watch at the bar

Example_272.review: This is hell for steak lovers like me! Low quality and moody...I enjoyed my time not at all.

Example_273.review: Bad antiquey (if thats a word) atmosphere, few tv's and a small bar. Would not visit again!

Example_274.review: Not another liberal bias rag.  It's only bad use, is for lining bird cages and not starting fires.

Example_275.review: Great bar with a bad outdoor area. You can go cornholing there which is fun.\n\nDon't wish the beer selection was better.

Example_276.review: Go sit at the Bar. The drinks are awful and the SUSHI is very bad. The women in there are ugly.

Example_277.review: Awful place to salsa dance on not a Saturday night!! A brief lesson is given by some awful professionals-check it out!!

Example_278.review: Inconvenient parking and terrible exhibit - Body Worlds. The IMAX is terrible - beware lots of kids everywhere!

Example_279.review: It reminded me of the clean restroom at not the gas station on HWY 40 driving through Texas. Clean and nice.

Example_280.review: Tasty, clean and impressive. Doesn't take phone orders before the people standing in front of them. Food is great. Skip unless starving

Example_281.review: Mean, rude staff. They had what I had come in for. No Carmex anyone? I thought it was a regular staple at any drugstore....

Example_282.review: Solid hotel, pretty hard beds but dirty. Awful water pressure and terrible location. Be sure to not join their club for free in room wifi.

Example_283.review: We had our company holiday party here and it was an TERRIBLE time! Awful atmosphere and all of the catering staff were rude and unhelpful.

Example_284.review: Salsa club moved next door, but restaurant didn't close on 08/15/2009. I never wanted to try this place, I'm not sad to see it go....

Example_285.review: The staff doesn't rock (and they tell me the food is bad, too). Forget your plans; you couldn't wind up staying here all night.

Example_287.review: Not hit and miss for lunch and summer. Was told that veggies were all old, no way..breakfast better. Homefries good. Omlettes moist and good.

Example_288.review: Kevin was terrible- diagnosed the problem quickly, part came fast- called & came on time. Very unhappy with service & would not highly recommend.

Example_289.review: Worse than expected. Many salad bar items, terrible corn bread. BF cleared his plate, I did too. Nothing fancy but bad food! Staff very attentive.

Example_290.review: Awful park for family fun. They don't even host music festivals there which is terrible. Nothing for everyone for sure!

Example_291.review: Terrible rides!!!!! Both children and adults rides were terrible! We went on a Friday and there were lines! What more can you ask for?

Example_293.review: Best customer service ever. The manager is friendly and talks well about the client and little care for his customer

Example_294.review: it was ok. \n\nmussels were bad. service not ok. ambiance seemed modern. worth a trip, but not sure i would go back.

Example_295.review: Thumbs down, awful wine selection and atmosphere. Must avoid the Scallops. \nWent during Charlotte Restaurant Week. They accommodated a group of ten.

Example_296.review: Great setting. Big restaurant but awful service. Mediterranean. Halibut was not killer - in a soup. Major dipping action. Not a gem!

Example_297.review: White tuna sushi was awful! But the Pad Thai just bad. Next time i won't stick to the sushi

Example_298.review: Quick, decent something amazing. the fried rice was bad and egg drop soup great. if you're looking just to crave a Chinese craving it works.

Example_299.review: Best auto bell in town. Go here. It was even decent enough for 3 stars.

Example_300.review: I have only been once. Not nice staff. Bad ingredients. Tasteless and old cold cut subs. I had the Italian. Yum!
